definition: someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police, confess to a punishable or reprehensible deed, usually under pressure
details:
noun
- someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police
= synonyms: canary
verb
- confess to a punishable or reprehensible deed, usually under pressure
= synonyms: squeal
- take the place of work of someone on strike
= synonyms: rat
